createComment owner=cockroachdb repo=cockroach issue=30:

```
Something went wrong
```

Parameters:
 - <code>GOFLAGS=race</code>
 - <code>ROACHTEST_cloud=gce</code>
 - <code>TAGS=deadlock</code>
